1.content: Starting off what year are you in?
1.title: What Year

135.content: It's not Ginny, it's others.
135.title: Other

141.content: Harry sat down next to Hermione as he prepared to ask for her help once again. "Hermione?" Harry said. "Yes, Harry?" Hermione said. " I still suspect that Malfoy is a death eater, and I need to know if he is or not." Harry said. " So I need your help." Harry asked nervously. There was a brief pause. "With what exactly?" Hermione said in a stern voice. "Well, I was hoping you could help me make Polyjuice Potion." Harry said almost in an instant. "Harry..." She said.
141.title: Polyjuice for information

1413.content:
"Harry... I don't know... Ron?" She said. Ron walked over to the couch in the gryffindor common room and sat down between Harry and Hermione. "Yeah?" He said. " Harry needs help making polyjucie potion." She said. "Blimey mate, are you trying to get us expelled?" Ron said. "No I need to know if Malfoy is a death eater or not..." Harry said. " Sounds good enough to me." Ron said. "But how will we get to him?" Hermione said. "Well only he hangs out with Crabbe and Goyle all the time... and I suspect they've beem using polyjuice potion... so I could only get to him through being a fe,a;e friend." He said. "Female?" Hermione said. "Blimey." said Ron. Hermione sat for a moment and thought about it. "Fine... but you two are gathering the ingredients." said Hermione. "Right.. Okay." said Harry.

1 month later

"Potion's nearly ready.. you two need to choose who can get closest to Draco. Remember to use the leg-locker curse and A knockout jinx." Hermione said. Harry wandered through his thoughts and found the perfect slytherin girls to change into.
1413.title: Decisions...Decisions...

14131.content:
"Daphne Greengrass and Pansy Parkinson." Harry said. "Right." said Ron.

Later a few minutes after dinner,They went over near the dungeons and saw both of them surrounding Draco like kittens. Draco dismissed them and they were alone in the hall. They started walking towards the door as Harry and Ron turned the corner and sent a knockout jinx at them. It hit them both square in the chest. Harry and Ron grabbed their bodies into a nearby supply closet. " Remember Ron..." He said looking at Ron. "A few of their hairs." He said. "Right, mate." Ron said. They grabbed a few of their hairs and put them into a small empty bottle. "On three..." Harry said. They prepared to cast the leg-locker curse. "One.. two.. three.. Locmotor Mortis." They said as quiet as possible.

A few minutes later in the girls' bathroom.

"Hermione, how long will the potion last?" Harry said. " Up to 5 hours." Hermione said. " 5 hours??"" Ron said. " Well depending on how well the ption is brewed it depends how long the effects will last." She said ibn retort. " Well we've got no other option mate." Harry said. They [poured the potion into two seperate goblets. Then they added their hairs. " Good luck." Harry said and then they drank.
14131.title: The transformation pt.1

141311.content:
Instantly they traanformed before Hermione's eyes. Harry first. He grew shorter and his hair grew brighter and longer as he groaned in pain. His bones were cracking and his chest was expanding to a c-cup. He moaned as he lost his manhood. He suddenly lost al; the hair a normal male would have.

Harry got up and looked in the mirror he saw: http://www.flickr.com/photos/wallyspam/5...

Ron groaned in pain as his hair got longer and darker. He groaned as his bones cracked and his chest expanded into a d-cup. He as well as Harry lost a few inches in height. He lost his manhood and lots of hair.

Ron looked in the mirror and saw:http://www.fanpop.com/clubs/pansy-parkinson/images/13390137/title/pansy-park inson-photo

" Well?" Harry said in a more feminine voice. "Perfect." Hermione said.

"Now you need to change.
141311.title: Daphne Potter and Pansy Weasley

info.description: Use Polyjucie Potion to transform into anyone you wish. No creature or half-breed tranformations. Human use only. Keep Cursing minimal. No killing, only Lord Voldemort may kill someone. Keep sexual content minimal. No gay stuff. Lesbian interacrions minimal.
